name: Jasper
tagline: AI copilot for enterprise marketing teams
description: Jasper is an AI copilot for marketing teams that helps create content at scale. With advanced AI capabilities, Jasper enables teams to maintain brand voice consistency while generating high-quality marketing copy, social media posts, and long-form content.

name: Copy.ai
description: Copy.ai is an AI-powered platform that helps marketers and businesses create compelling copy in seconds. From blog posts to email campaigns, Copy.ai streamlines the content creation process.

name: Pencil
description: Pencil uses AI to generate winning ad creative at scale. The platform analyzes performance data to predict which creative concepts will perform best, helping marketers optimize their ad spend.

name: Smartly.io
description: Smartly.io combines creative automation with intelligent media buying to help brands scale their social advertising. The platform enables teams to produce thousands of ad variations while optimizing performance in real-time.

name: AppsFlyer
description: AppsFlyer is the leading mobile attribution and marketing analytics platform. It helps marketers measure and optimize their mobile campaigns across channels, providing accurate attribution data and deep linking capabilities.

name: Singular
description: Singular provides unified marketing analytics that combines attribution, cost aggregation, and creative analytics. The platform helps marketers understand their true ROI across all channels.

name: The Trade Desk
description: The Trade Desk is a leading technology company that empowers buyers of advertising through its self-service platform. It enables advertisers to create, manage, and optimize digital advertising campaigns across various channels.

name: LiveRamp
description: LiveRamp provides identity resolution and data connectivity solutions that enable companies to connect customer data across systems and channels while maintaining privacy and compliance.

name: Segment
tagline: Customer data platform for unified data
description: Segment is a customer data platform that collects, cleans, and controls customer data. It provides a single view of the customer by connecting data from multiple sources to any tool or warehouse.

name: Branch
description: Branch is the leading mobile linking and measurement platform, trusted by the most top ranking apps to increase efficiency and revenue through enterprise-grade links. Deep linking and attribution for mobile apps.

name: Persado
description: Persado uses AI and machine learning to generate the language that motivates each individual to engage and act. The platform optimizes marketing messages for emotion and personalization.

name: AdRoll
tagline: Growth marketing platform for D2C brands
description: AdRoll is a growth marketing platform that helps ambitious D2C brands compete and grow by using AI to find more customers. Cross-channel advertising and retargeting made simple.

name: Amplitude
tagline: Digital analytics platform for product teams
description: Amplitude is the leading digital analytics platform that helps companies understand user behavior and build better products. Real-time analytics, behavioral cohorts, and predictive insights.

name: Mixpanel
tagline: Product analytics for mobile and web
description: Mixpanel helps companies measure what matters, make decisions fast, and build better products through data. Powerful event tracking and user analytics for product teams.

name: Braze
description: Braze is a comprehensive customer engagement platform that powers relevant and memorable experiences between consumers and brands. Push, email, in-app messaging and more in one platform.

name: Crisp
tagline: Retail data platform for CPG brands
description: Crisp connects consumer brands with real-time retail data to help them sell more and waste less. Demand signals, inventory analytics, and supply chain optimization.

name: Kochava
description: Kochava provides unified audience platform capabilities including attribution, analytics, and data management. Comprehensive mobile measurement and fraud prevention.

name: Neurons
description: Neurons uses neuroscience and AI to predict how consumers will respond to creative before launch. Optimize ads, packaging, and digital experiences with attention prediction.
